channel.title: 718 max cash glitch need help
channel.description: when a players has max cash or close and sells a item to a shop and goes over max cash there cash stack will be fully reset to about 1gp how can i fix this thanks!

item.title: 718 max cash glitch need help
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“DAn0194, post:3, topic:541476”][quote author=Pure_ link=topic=660345.msg4415345#msg4415345 date=1395626365]
Do a check in your buying method.

if (player.getInventory().getMoney().getAmount() + (itemPrice * itemAmount) < Integer.MAX_VALUE) { // ... }
[/quote]
You can also just add this in the add item method so there is no way he goes over the cash limit.[/quote]That will scrap the excess though, which is unfair, this way he can prevent that. An item-bound check would be better though.

boolean canAdd(int amount) { return this.amount + amount < Integer.MAX_Value && ItemUtils.isStackable(this.id); }
